TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%d1_Num Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%d1_Num Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era

TEXT.English: An enemy unit has been enslaved!
A part of our population from %s1 is emigrating to the New World!
TEXT.Chinese: 我国%s1的部分人口移民新大陆！

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when a Hindu Temple is built
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建成一座印度教神庙后创立

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city

TEXT.English: %D1_Mod%%: for trading with Defensive Pact partner
TEXT.Chinese: %D1_Mod%%: for trading with Defensive Pact partner

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points for low amount of traded resources
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]交易资源减少时不降低稳定度

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points on city conquest
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City up to a Maximum of %D3
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市中每驻军一单位%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad，上限为%D3

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] in Capital for every Vassal City
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] in Capital for every Vassal City
[ICON_BULLET]每收纳一个附庸国稳定点数+4

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+4 Stability Points for each civilization starting point controlled
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每控制一个文明发源地稳定点数+4

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No more than one corporation per city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Post-communist crisis in case of economic system switch
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每座城市只能入驻一种公司[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]改变经济制度将导致经济危机

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can convert production to commerce with %D1_Mod%% efficiency
[SPACE]per Specialist for every city that works at most %d1 land tiles
TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE]于每一位城市中的专业人员（城市工作地块不超过%d1块）

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points for each city founded at least 15 tiles from the capital
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每建立一个距离首都15格以上的城市稳定点数+2

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] with Defensive Pact partners
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] with Defensive Pact partners

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] going through your Capital

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]1 Free Technology From Your Current Or Earlier Eras
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]1 Free Technology From Your Current Or Earlier Eras

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_Num Free Technologies From Your Current Or Earlier Eras

TEXT.English: Removing a %s1 near your city of %s2 has created %d3 [ICON_GOLD] for your treasury.
TEXT.Chinese: 移除%s2附近的一处%s1，并带来了%d3[ICON_GOLD]的收入。

TEXT.English: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.
TEXT.Chinese: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.
自动进行游戏剩余回合数: %d1_Num

TEXT.English: A %s1 embassy has been established in
You have escaped and regained control of %s1 territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!
TEXT.Chinese: 你已卷土重来掌握了%s1的统治权。现在去好好教训敌人吧！

TEXT.English: You have escaped and regained control of
territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!
TEXT.Chinese: 的统治权。现在去好好教训敌人吧！

TEXT.English: You have been captured by the %s1:2 and exiled to the unimportant lands of %s2. You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.
TEXT.Chinese: 你已被%s1:2流放到偏远的%s2。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。

TEXT.English: You have been captured by the
and exiled to the unimportant lands of
. You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.
TEXT.Chinese: 。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。

TEXT.English: Conquerors from a far away continent are invading our lands searching for wealth!
TEXT.Chinese: 来自遥远大陆的征服者开始入侵我们的领土，疯狂掠取财富！

TEXT.English: A group of our own adventurers has arrived in the new world searching for wealth!
TEXT.Chinese: 我国的一支探险队已经抵达新大陆，寻找传说中的财富！

TEXT.English: Some of our forces are joining the enemy to help their war of liberation!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的部分军队加入了叛乱者，为他们的独立而战！

TEXT.English: Some of our enemy's forces are joining us to help our war of liberation!
TEXT.Chinese: 敌人的部分军队决定反戈一击，为我们的独立而战！

TEXT.English: We refused the flip, this means war!
TEXT.Chinese: 拒绝他们的要求，这意味着战争！

TEXT.English: Cities in the area have joined our rising empire!
TEXT.Chinese: 一些地方的城市加入了我们正在崛起的帝国！

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]want to flip to a rising civilization. Our refusal may lead to a war and some of our troops may join it. Should we let them go?
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE]希望加入一个初起的文明。如果我们拒绝可能导致战争的爆发及部分军队的叛离。我们要给予他们自由吗？

TEXT.English: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Our specialists increase the prestige of our city!"
TEXT.Chinese: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Our specialists increase the prestige of our city!"

TEXT.English: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City
TEXT.Chinese: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City

TEXT.English: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City
TEXT.Chinese: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City

TEXT.English: cities have declared independence from their foreign domination!
TEXT.Chinese: 一些城市宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！

TEXT.English: %s1 cities have declared their independence from their foreign domination!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1人宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！

TEXT.English: The trade passing through our waters brings %d1 [ICON_GOLD] to our treasury!
TEXT.Chinese: The trade passing through our waters brings %d1 [ICON_GOLD] to our treasury!
%s1的军队已经入侵了我国领土！

TEXT.English: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.
TEXT.Chinese: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.

TEXT.English: Nationalism has changed the conception of armies: Mercenaries no longer fit in!
TEXT.Chinese: 民族主义的兴起改变了军队的构成：雇佣军已经不合时宜！

TEXT.English: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.Chinese: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.

TEXT.English: A %s1 has been born after the construction of La Mezquita in %s2!
TEXT.Chinese: A %s1 has been born after the construction of La Mezquita in %s2!

TEXT.English: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
TEXT.Chinese: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having the current building in your capital
Your Spy has reached the status of a Great Spy!
TEXT.Chinese: Your Spy has reached the status of a Great Spy!

TEXT.English: The Mongol hordes have invaded %s1_civ_adjective territory!
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了%s1_civ_adjective领土!

TEXT.English: The Mongol hordes have invaded our territory!
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了我国领土!

TEXT.English: There are new mercenaries available for hiring.
Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
TEXT.Chinese: 你是否希望接手控制%s1文明？

TEXT.English: Do you wish to take permanent control of the
A new civilization is being born
The generous people of %s2_city have donated famine relief to the endangered people of %s4_city. This humanitarian effort has brought the two nations closer together.
TEXT.Chinese: The generous people of %s2_city have donated famine relief to the endangered people of %s4_city. This humanitarian effort has brought the two nations closer together.

TEXT.English: The generous people of %s2_city have donated massive famine relief to the starving people of %s4_city. This generous humanitarian effort has brought the two nations much closer together.
TEXT.Chinese: The generous people of %s2_city have donated massive famine relief to the starving people of %s4_city. This generous humanitarian effort has brought the two nations much closer together.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective investments in horticulture have paid off! A new minor industry is thriving in %s2_city, boosting health and research.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective在医药方面的投资获得了回报！一项新兴特色产业正在%s2_city发展壮大，推进了民众健康和科研工作。

TEXT.English: You lack a state religion with religious goals!
TEXT.Chinese: You lack a state religion with religious goals!

TEXT.English: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to abandon their Pagan Temple.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1在%s2的传播导致市民们放弃了他们的原始神庙

TEXT.English: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.
TEXT.Chinese: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.

TEXT.English: Which religion do you want to persecute in %s1?
TEXT.Chinese: 你想从%s1中移除哪种宗教？

TEXT.English: Religious persecution in %s2 has removed %s1 from the city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2的宗教审判把%s1从这座城市中移除。
瘟疫导致居民死亡，地点：

TEXT.English: Plague has killed our unit near
TEXT.Chinese: 瘟疫造成单位损失，地点：

TEXT.English: The turn in which your UHV goals must be completed is displayed even after the discovery of Calendar.
TEXT.Chinese: The turn in which your UHV goals must be completed is displayed even after the discovery of Calendar.

TEXT.English: UN Resolution - Decolonize %s1_city (%s2_player) (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.Chinese: UN Resolution - Decolonize %s1_city (%s2_player) (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)

TEXT.English: Send Inquisition to %s1 (Requires %d2 of %d3 Total Votes)
TEXT.Chinese: Send Inquisition to %s1 (Requires %d2 of %d3 Total Votes)

TEXT.English: UN Resolution - Free %s1_player from %s2_civ_adjective Control (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.Chinese: UN Resolution - Free %s1_player from %s2_civ_adjective Control (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)

TEXT.English: cities have declared their independence from us and expelled our garrisons. Shall we leave them free?
TEXT.Chinese: 一些城市宣布脱离我国统治独立建国，并赶走了我们的驻军。我们要允许他们独立吗？

TEXT.English: %s1 cities have declared their independence from us and expelled our garrisons. Shall we leave them free?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1人宣布独立建国并赶走了我们的驻军。我们要给予他们自由吗？

TEXT.English: The invention of the Printing Press has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Protestant churches are opposing the power of the Pope over Christian affairs. Shall we embrace the Reformation? All our Catholic cities and buildings will be converted to the new religion. If we convert now, we will receive a bonus of 500 gold for rapidly taking control of Church assets.
TEXT.Chinese: 印刷机的发明已经推动了一波新的思潮。新教反对教皇在基督教内至高无上的权力。我们是否应该实施宗教改革？我们所有信仰天主教的城市将自动L依新教。若我们现在实施改革，我们将迅速控制教会资产并获得500金币。

TEXT.English: The sun rises on the year %s1_year. The %s2_civ people are ready to settle down and found your first city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting that you can build a Civilization to stand the test of time!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_year年第一天的太阳已经升起。%s2_civ人民决定结束游牧生活，并为你建造一座城市。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader，你的人民愿意赋予你最高的权力。并坚信你能开创一个历久弥新的文明！

TEXT.English: While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.
TEXT.Chinese: While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.

TEXT.English: A vast army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving west across the Iranian Plateau!
TEXT.Chinese: 一支庞大的塞尔柱突厥军队正在向西横跨伊朗高原！

TEXT.English: You have acquired %d1 [ICON_GOLD] by sinking a %s2 %s3.
[ICON_BULLET]Missionaries cannot spread in civilizations that have a different state religion
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Missionaries cannot spread in civilizations that have a different state religion

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Converting to this religion requires controlling its holy city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Converting to this religion requires controlling its holy city

TEXT.English: As the Cradle of Civilization, we can choose another free technology:
TEXT.Chinese: As the Cradle of Civilization, we can choose another free technology:

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Trade Route Yield per Culture Level

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num World Wonders with %s2_LevelName Culture[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num National Wonders with %s2_LevelName Culture[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Chinese: Can build %d1 World Wonders per City
